description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Message_TemplateObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Message_TemplateObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Message_TemplateObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Unique Reference to the Message Template. Used to identify the Message Template to update. Leave blank on an Add.

Message_Template_Data.description: Unique identifier for the message template.  If not entered, one will be generated.

validation.validation: A Message Template with the same name already exists. Please enter a new Message Template name.

Notification_CategoryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Notification_CategoryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Notification_CategoryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
